abstract: Phillip Murphy, former head of the bank’s municipal derivatives desk, was charged with conspiracy to defraud the United States, wire fraud and conspiracy to make false entries in bank records.
snippet: Phillip Murphy, former head of the bank’s municipal derivatives desk, was charged with conspiracy to defraud the United States, wire fraud and conspiracy to make false entries in bank records.
lead_paragraph: A former executive at the Bank of America Corporation has been indicted in connection with what prosecutors called a “far-reaching conspiracy” to defraud municipal bond investments through bid-rigging.

headline.main: Ex-Bank of America Official Indicted in Muni Bid-Rigging
headline.print_headline: Ex-Bank of America Official Indicted in Muni Bid-Rigging
